@KinkyAsTheyCum please. This is Hentai. The exact same thing happens with western porn. Both sexes, but mostly women, get wrongly represented in porn. It's just how it is, and it's worldwide. The problem with Japan's declining birthrate is a little deeper then men looking at Hentai and being like "oH So ThIs iS HOw It hApPEns". There are declining birthrates all over the world, and it mostly is due to social media and how people are actually interacting with each other, or rather, the lack of actual interaction. Men and woman don't ever learn how to interact with the opposite sex properly and instead op to go for porn, sex dolls, video games, anime, and reddit. The problem doesn't lie with just hentai, but social media and porn as a whole. 

TL;DR: everyone knows this isn't how shit works in real life, the problem with Japan's (as well as the world's) declining birthrate is social media as a whole, not people trying to learn how to interact with the opposite sex from a hentai plot.

Let's review:

First Act: Overly Attached Stalker
Second Act: Overly Attached Senpai
Third Act: Overly Attached Date
Final Act: Overly Attached Girlfriend

This is how relationships happen according to Japanese logic. And then they wonder why Dating/Relationships/Marriage in there society are at an all time low. Neither gender has any clue what to do and don't even want to make an attempt to try. The story started off uncomfortably scary and then became strangely wholesome this would not happen in the real world. I hope there's nobody out there who actually believes something like this is possible.
